item.title: Trump's Social Security chief backs down from 'shutting down' agency
item.description: The head of the U.S. Social Security Administration has backed down from "shutting down the agency" after a federal judge rebuked him.

item.title: SEC to see exodus as hundreds take Trump's buyout offers: Reuters
item.description: The SEC is facing a staff exodus amid President Donald Trump and Elon Musk's efforts to remake the U.S. government, five sources said.

item.title: Trump says 'there'll be flexibility' on reciprocal tariffs

item.title: Trump floats sending Tesla attackers to El Salvador prisons as White House rallies to defend Musk
item.description: Tesla and SpaceX boss Elon Musk, the world's richest man, donated more than $250 million toward President Donald Trump's successful presidential campa...

item.title: UAE commits to $1.4 trillion investment framework in US, White House says
item.description: The United Arab Emirates has committed to a 10-year, $1.4 trillion investment framework in the United States, a White House official said on Friday.
